casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patrick MYLETT 6A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 14, 2019 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Mylett, Patrick. Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of January 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of January 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 8th day of March 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
